bibdk:alternativeTitle.bibdk:alternativeTitleElement: Mister, where is Vietnam?. Proud to serve. Greetings (Uncle Sam wants you). Hell no - We won't go. It's America, love it or leave it. War is hell. 'In country' voices. Peace, now!. Searching for closure. Beyond the wall. In the rearview mirrow. Vets look back

bibdk:details.bibdk:contributors: by Hugo Keesing ; edited by Bill Geerhart
